title: Boutique, unpretentious luxury in the financial district
text: We booked rooms for my son's wedding. Although the hotel can be tricky to find in the maze of downtown streets, it was cozy enough and the rooms spacious for everyone's needs. The staff (including the front desk) extended themselves over any little detail or want. There is an onsite bar and restaurant, Felice, and you are very close to the 9/11 memorial and the Oculus shopping center, in addition to Wall Street itself. Upon our checkout on Sunday, it seemed quite a few business travelers were checking in, so I gather the hotel works well for both business and leisure.
